confirm_description: Don’t miss out on learning about the new changes to Cloudflare Zero Trust!
confirm_title: Are you sure you want to exit?
nav_step_1_description: You can now manage your Zero Trust organization in the same Cloudflare dashboard as your application and network services, developer tools, and more.
nav_step_1_title: Zero Trust has joined the Cloudflare dashboard
nav_step_2_description: Instead of opening another window or typing in a URL, you can go back to the Cloudflare dashboard in one click.
nav_step_3_description: View and switch accounts at the top of your sidebar.
nav_step_4_description: Find helpful links to our Community, developer documentation, and support team at the top of your navigation bar.
